headline: AES Announces the Expiration and Results of Cash Tender Offer for Any and All of Its 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) ("AES" or the "Company") announced that the previously announced tender offer to purchase (the "Tender Offer") for cash, subject to certain terms and conditions, any and all of its outstanding 3.300% Senior Notes due 2025 (the "Securities") expired at 5:00 p.m., New York City time, on March 18, 2025 (the "Expiration Time"). As of the Expiration Time, $776,214,000 or 86.25%% of the $900 million aggregate principal amount outstanding of the Securities had been valid
